comment: This is an example story! Feel free to use this as your base!
intro: You are in your space ship going on an interplanetary vacation with your family.
You and your family are sleeping. Your mom and dad take shifts with the controls. Currently, your dad is awake and flying the ship.
In the morning you decide to walk around your family's luxurious ship since you haven't gotten a chance to explore much yet. The lights are out so you grab a flashlight and hope it doesn't run out.
goalText: Have every item in your inventory at once, you may need some help to carry all of them!

toilet-paper.name: Toilet Paper
toilet-paper.tooltip: An essential! I don't see why I would need it at the moment though...

flashlight.name: Flashlight
flashlight.tooltip: If this runs out it's game over for me! I better use it sparingly.

keycard1.name: Level 1 Keycard
keycard1.tooltip: I bet it unlocks that door

blueprint.name: Blueprint
blueprint.tooltip: It shows a map of the facility. There are other wings but they are locked behind big doors requiring high level keycards.

keycard2.name: Level 2 Keycard
keycard2.tooltip: That's weird... did someone drop this?

sleeper.name: Sleeper Cabin
sleeper.description: The family sleeps here. There are bunk beds and a closet, your see your brother's candy bar collection

cleaning.name: Cleaning Room
cleaning.description: A closet with cleaning equipment along with a helper robot to use them. A large cabinet can be found as well as a weird looking and very large door.

cockpit-hall.name: Hallway
cockpit-hall.description: A hallway leading to the cockpit with nothing other than portholes looking out into open space.

cockpit.name: Cockpit
cockpit.description: Your dad is at the controls, he seems spaced out. Nothing but an abundance of buttons and dials.

captain-quarters.name: Captain's Quarters
captain-quarters.description: The master bedroom of the ship, your dad sleeps here. You shouldn't take any of his things.

lavatory.name: Lavatory
lavatory.description: It's much better than the bathrooms on commercial ships, that's for sure...

kitchen.name: Kitchen
kitchen.description: A small kitchen with a robot to do the cooking. The robot is carrying an egg beater.

viewing-deck.name: Viewing Deck
viewing-deck.description: A large room with a full wall window of bulletproof glass that looks out into open space. You hope it's safe...

the-door.name: The Door
the-door.description: You open the door and look inside. It's big enough for you to walk in.
the-door.requiredText: The door is locked, it looks like you need a keycard.

strange-hallway.name: Strange Passageway
strange-hallway.description: You enter the cabinet which leads to a secret passageway. There are way too many cobwebs! You use the broom to clear out the many cobwebs and after a while you finally get to the end of the tunnel. You find a keycard labeled "Level 1". Your gut says you should pick it up.
strange-hallway.requiredText: You open up the cabinet to find a long passageway filled with cobwebs! you seriously can't walk through that thing, you'll need a broom or something.

the-facility.name: The Facility
the-facility.description: You find yourself in a strange place, it looks like it could be a facility or lab of some kind. You are in a large hallway. The walls are sterile white.

wing-a.name: Wing A
wing-a.description: Another hallway with lots and lots of doors. Most doors are protected with a magnetic lock. Looking through the many bulletproof windows you can see offices and storage spaces, an open door catches your eye.

office.name: Office
office.description: A small office space with a few items lying around. There is a door on the other side of the room, it's locked but you can unlock it from inside.

wing-b.name: Wing B
wing-b.description: The walls are lined with indicator lights for whatever systems they have. There are a few locked doors. There is a logo depicting an atom projected on the far end of the hallway.
